citations.narrative:
An equipment shed, containing a tractor and gas cans, is located in the pasture used for the reindeers. The reindeer could
enter this area and become injured by the equipment. The facility shall be remained in good repair to protect the animals
from injury. A method must be developed to prevent animals from accessing this area to prevent injury.
CORRECT BY: 7/18/2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility manager.
Additional Inspectors:
ELIZABETH PANNILL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
An equipment shed, containing a tractor and gas cans, is located in the pasture used for the reindeers. The reindeer could 
enter this area and become injured by the equipment. The facility shall be remained in good repair to protect the animals 
from injury. A method must be developed to prevent animals from accessing this area to prevent injury. 
CORRECT BY: 7/18/2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility manager. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
ELIZABETH PANNILL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
